name: Wreckdigger //beta
description:
Hello. Here I have posted my first attempt to start as a solo game developer of an action platformer game with metroidvania elements. It's made within Game Maker Studio 2.  Game is still in development.

COMING SOON. Game for Windows!

WRECKDIGGER STORY:

The main hero Baxter was a rebel fighter on the losing side against the New Empire. Barely survived his last battle and was placed into a metal body to stay alive. With ongoing battles between the New Empire and rebels guarding the outer borders of known space. Stranded on a planet called Alura, main hero became a scavenger of fallen spacecrafts, looking for his long lost father who was taken away by the New Empire, the goal of which is to conquer the last free people living behind the space borders.

CONTROLS:

LEFT, RIGHT arrow keys - walk

DOWN arrow key - use, talk, shield

Z - jump

X - shoot(projectiles out of robotic hero's body chest)

C - spinattack(when obtained)

SPACE and Z - Jetpack

ENTER - inventory

A or LEFT arrow key -  inv left

S or RIGHT arrow key -inv right

D - Use selected item

M - Map(when obtained)

R - Reset game

COMING SOON. Game for Windows!

Your feedback and comments would help to improve the game.

Thanks for your support!
